AccountSid.description: The SID of the [Account](https://www.twilio.com/docs/iam/api/account) that created the Key resources to update.

Sid.description: The Twilio-provided string that uniquely identifies the Key resource to update.

FriendlyName.description: A descriptive string that you create to describe the resource. It can be up to 64 characters long.

$ul: **date_created**: The date and time in GMT that the resource was created specified in [RFC 2822](https://www.ietf.org/rfc/rfc2822.txt) format.
**date_updated**: The date and time in GMT that the resource was last updated specified in [RFC 2822](https://www.ietf.org/rfc/rfc2822.txt) format.
**friendly_name**: The string that you assigned to describe the resource.
**sid**: The unique string that that we created to identify the Key resource.
